name: Demolition Master 3D
description: With Demolition Master 3D you will feel like the real bomb expert capable of tackling even the most complicated tasks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp / Vista / Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: min. 64MB

reviews.review_text: Total crap, boring as you can get. Thought I would give it a shot as it came in a bundle, but all you do is blow up stacks of lumber and steel, not buildings like I was expecting. I've played older dos based demolition games with more to do than this pile of ##$%.
